short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool to improve the health of your inbox.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The first version adds a shortcut to search for the sender of an email with the click of a button. If you want to get rid of lots of emails from a sender, this saves a lot of time.
